summary: The diff implements all 8 requirements for bank account linking functionality. Backend adds bankAccountNumber field to UserProfile, implements setBankAccount and getBankAccount functions with proper access control. Frontend creates BankLinkingPage component with form validation and success/error handling, implements useSetBankAccount and useGetBankAccount hooks using React Query, adds /bank-linking route with authentication guard, and adds navigation link on ProfilePage with linked status indicator. A migration module handles schema changes. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for converting old UserProfile schema from bankAccountLinked Bool to bankAccountNumber ?Text
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirement for migration logic or handling existing profiles with a bankAccountLinked field. The migration suggests a previous field existed that was not mentioned in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional query invalidation for bankAccount query key in useSetBankAccount hook
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22 specifies invalidating only the currentUserProfile query on success. The implementation also invalidates a bankAccount query which was not requested.
